definition.text: This program is designed to incentivize users to fork the Superalgos repository, a necessary step to contributing.

paragraphs.text: Giving a star and watching the repository is incentivized to make the repository easier to find by developers serching on Github.com.

This program distributes tokens from the Github pool. Maintaining your fork of the Superalgos repository may grant you up to SA 1,000. The same goes for a star, and for watching the repo. That is, this program features a cap of SA 3,000 per user.
